data.title: Exchange
data.meta_description: Microsoft Exchange is the email service for IU. Get more information on accessing your Exchange account through Microsoft Outlook Web App.
data.text:
Log in to the Outlook Web App via a desktop PC, laptop, mobile device, or campus workstation with your IU username and passphrase. You can also access your mail directly by logging into office.com with your username@iu.edu email address and your IU passphrase.

Get information on configuring and managing your account

Like any university, IU has email policies for students, faculty, and staff. Keep the following email policies in mind when using your Microsoft Exchange account:

Responsibilities as a computer user at IU

What to know to avoid getting in trouble with email

Policy: Official communications from IU to students

Policy: Mass mailing via email

Policy: Surveys via email
